mapper.update:
update T_TASKS_STATUS
TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENARINO_START_DATE = #{scenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCENARINO_END_DATE = #{scenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RANGE_DAY = #{rangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STEPINDEX = #{stepindex,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASKS_END_DATE = #{tasksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEICCITYCONFIG = #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIZHU3 = #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TASKS_ID = #{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_TASKS_STATUS set TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENARINO_START_DATE = #{scenarinoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCENARINO_END_DATE = #{scenarinoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RANGE_DAY = #{rangeDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STEPINDEX = #{stepindex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASKS_END_DATE = #{tasksEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SOURCEID = #{sourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALCTYPE = #{calctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSAL = #{psal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSAL = #{ssal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEICCITYCONFIG = #{meiccityconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU2 = #{beizhu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIZHU3 = #{beizhu3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TASKS_ID = #{tasksId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SCENARINO_END_DATE from T_TASKS_STATUS where TASKS_SCENARINO_ID = #{tasksScenarinoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT MIN(PATH_DATE) FROM T_SCENARINO_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN T_TASKS_STATUS B ON A.SCENARINO_ID=B.TASKS_SCENARINO_ID WHERE A.SCENARINO_TYPE='4' AND B.BEIZHU='0'
